content:
To reduce stress levels, techniques include: 
1. Mind-Body Techniques (Deep Breathing, Meditation & Mindfulness, Progressive Muscle Relaxation)
2. Physical Activities (Exercise, Yoga or Tai Chi, Stretching)
3. Mental & Emotional Strategies (Journaling, Positive Self-talk, Set Realistic Goals)
4. Lifestyle Habits (Sleep Well, Balanced Diet, Stay Hydrated)
5. Social Support (Talk to Someone You Trust, Join a Support Group)
6. Relaxing Activities (Listen to Calming Music, Spend Time in Nature, Hobbies)
7. Quick Techniques for Immediate Relief (Take a cold or warm shower, Step outside for fresh air, Hold a comforting object).

Sources: How_to_Reduce_Stress_Levels.pdf (.pdf)
